long_description: The Westcomb Apoc is an active alpine jacket that's decked out for your expeditions. At 1 lb. 1 oz., this shell won't weigh you down when you're on the move. Tightly woven 3-layer Polartec(R) NeoShell(R) ripstop nylon offers wet-weather protection and breathability; the soft hand and 2-way stretch enhance your comfort. Micro seam taping ensures 100% protection and helps keep the Apoc jacket lightweight and flexible. Super durable fabric adhesive affixes critical zipper and hem areas, creating waterproof, stitch-free, lightweight seams with weld-like durability and clean aesthetics. Helmet-compatible hood with stiff, welded brim cinches down for a close fit that provides unhindered peripheral vision. High collar with softly lined chin guard provides comfort and protection from the elements for your neck and face. Watertight front zipper provides smooth operation; interior stormflap prevents weather penetration. During extreme heat-generating activity, underarm zipper vents maximize air circulation to the body's core. Rip-and-stick cuff closures keep snow, wind and rain from creeping in. Drawcord hem adjusts with 1 hand; cinch the drawcord from within the hand pockets and press the 1-hand release on the outside hem to release. Articulated sleeves ensure comfortable mobility. Westcomb Apoc jacket has zip hand pockets, Napoleon chest pocket and bicep pocket; interior media-friendly stash pocket keeps phone and other valuable secure.
